197992.「……ルッチー。\n やはり ここにいたのか。\n 送った手紙は 読んだか？:
...Lucchie. So you're here after all. Did you
read the letter I sent you?

197993.「……ちーす。\n 手紙 ありがとよ～。\n 紙ヒコーキにして 楽しく遊んどいた:
...yeah, I got it. Thanks. I folded it into a
paper airplane and had fun playing with
it.

197994.「ペアレンツで そろって来るなんて\n 賢者って 案外 ヒマなんだなあ？:
I'm surprised you both came. I guess sages
aren't as busy as they say, huh?

197995.「ルッチー！\n 私たちは お前のためを思って……。:
Lucchie! We're doing this because we care
about you...

197996.「何度も 言っているだろう。\n 遊び人などという くだらん職業は\n さっさと:
How many times do we have to tell you? Quit
that worthless vocation you call a gadabout
already.

197997.「いいか…… 遊び人など なんの役にも立たん。\n くさった死体にたかる ハエの:
Don't you see? Gadabouts are utterly useless,
like flies that gather around Walking Corpses.
Such a pointless job does you no good!

197998.「……イマドキの遊び人は アンタたちが思ってる\n ダセェ職業じゃねえ。もっと:
Gadabouts nowadays aren't what you think they are, ya know... They're a heck of a lot more funny. Don't judge if you have no clue what
you're talkin' about.

197999.「ルッチー あなたも いい大人でしょう。\n 遊びだなんて ふざけたようなこと言:
You are an adult, Lucchie. That's why you need
to stop fooling around, and face reality!

198000.「これ以上 言っても ムダのようだな。:
It's useless trying to talk any sense into
you.

198001.「……だが 今は 楽しかろうとも\n じきに 遊び人の無力さに気づくだろう。\n:
...but whatever fun you may be having now,
you'll soon realize how pointless it all is.
When that time comes, you will regret it.

198002.「なにあれ～ カンジわるぅ～。: What was that...? What a terrible feelin'...

198003.「やべぇ～。あの人たちが ウワサの\n ルッチーさんの ペアレンツですかぁ。\n:
Oh, wow... Those people were the rumored
parents Lucchie has, right?? Oh man...
That's reeeally bad...

198004.「……ハイハイ！ そんなことは置いといて！\n これからやる遊びの 内容を発表し:
...Alrighty then! Let's just forget about that
for now! I wanna tell you about the game we're
about to play!

198005.「今回は前から あたためてた とびきりの企画！\n その名も……ハニーパーティー:
This is somethin' I've been saving for a long
time now! It's called... Honey Party!!

198006.「オォーーーッ！ マイ・ハニィーッ！！\n オレの あまいキッスをォ あげるゥー:
Ooooooooohhh!! My HONEY!! I will give you
my SWEET KISSES!!

198007.「プクランド大陸の エピステーサ丘陵って場所に\n ハニーレイクっていう ハチミ:
Somewhere in the Epistesa Hills in Pukuland,
there's a lake made of honey... It's called
Honey Lake.

198008.「ハニーレイクを 熱で沸かして温泉にすんのさ！\n さらにぃ～ そのハチミツ風呂:
We'll heat that lake up and turn it into hot
springs! Then while bathing in our honey bath,
we'll use that honey to make pancakes!!

198009.「ほよよ～ なんか たのぴよそ～♪\n ハチミツ三昧で あまあまだね～！:
Oh, my～! It sounds like so much fun! ♪
It'll be as sweet as honey!

198010.「だがな～ この遊びの準備は あまくねーぞ。\n 湖をあっためる <%sEV_Q:
Buuut...we're not ready to play just yet.
We'll need some Warmaline to heat up that
lake, and to make those delicious pancakes.

198011.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>なら バザーとかで\n たくさん 売ってるっす:
I'm sure you kind find lots of 'em at the
Bazaar and such! Do you think five per
person is enough for everyone?!

198012.「ケーキといえば～ オルフェアの町に\n おいしいと評判のケーキ屋さんが あった:
Speaking of cakes... I heard Orphea has an
a cake shop known for delicious cakes!
I'm sure their pancakes are yummy too! ♪

198013.「なるなる～。んじゃ それらを各自で集めてきて\n ３つあるうちの 真ん中のハニ:
Gotcha, gotcha! All right! Everyone grab what
you need, then we'll all meet up in the Honey
Lake that's in the middle of the other three!

198014.「それと 服のままで温泉に入るわけにいかねーし\n 水着着用で シクヨロ！ どの:
And of course, ya can't go into the hot springs in regular clothes, so make sure to put on a swimsuit! Any swimsuit's fine,
just make sure ya can swim in it!

198015.「じゃ みんな～ <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM4>個の<%sEV_QUE_NA:
Okay, everyone! Bring five Warmaline and some
delicious pancakes to Honey Lake in Epistesa
Hills! Bring your swimsuits, too!

198016.「イエーイ <pc>っち！\n 準備 カンペキみたいだなぁ～！\n さっすが～！:
Yeeah, ! Looks like you did a great job getting everything ready, but of course you would! Lookin' good in that
swimsuit, too!

198018.<pc>たちは ホカホカストーンを\nハニーレイクに 投げ入れた！:
<pc> threw the Warmalines into Honey
Lake!

198019.ホカホカストーンで 湖があたたまっていく……。\nハニーレイクは ハチミツ温泉に:
The Warmalines begin heating up the lake...
Turning Honey Lake into honey hot springs!

198020.<pc>たちは パンケーキを持ちよって\nハニーパーティーを始めた！:
<pc> and co. started the Honey
Party, bringing the pancakes with them!

198021.「ごくらく ごくらくぅ～！\n いい湯かげんだぜ～。\n 前から やってみたかっ:
Ahhh, soooo warm! These hot springs're great,
aren't they? Glad I finally got a chance to
try out this game!

198022.「ほよよ～ ホント サイコー♪\n とろけて ハチミツになっちゃいそ～<hear:
Oh, my... This really is the best! ♪
I feel like I'm just melting away, turning
into honey... <heart>

198023.「クゥ～ やっべぇ～！\n アクロバット・パンケーキ うめぇ～っす！\n ハチミ:
Deeeeeeee-lish! These Acrobat Pancakes are
soooo good! The flavor combo with the honey
is just perfection!!

198024.「オォーーーッ！ フィーバーッ！！\n オレに 触れると ヤケドするぜィッ！！:
Whooooa!! Feeeeeeveeeeerrr!!!
Don't touch me, you'll get BURNED!!!

198025.「ハハッ 何いってんだ パイセン。\n 熱いのはパイセンじゃなくて ハチミツだろ:
Haha, what are you on about? It's not you
who's hot, it's all this honey...

198027.「ギャアーーーッ！\n やべぇ～ アッツーーッ！: Gaaahhh!!! Not good!! It's too hot!!!

198028.「あ～っ！！\n ホカホカストーンが たくさん増えてる～！\n こんなに入れた覚:
Huh?! There's so many Warmalines!! I don't
remember us putting in so many...so why
then...?

198030.「誰だ！！\n イタズラしやがったのはっ！？:
Who's there?! Who's behind this horrible
prank!?

198031.「ちゃっ★ちゃーんっ！！\n 伝説の遊び人……参上ォーッ！！:
Tah-daaaaaaaaaahhh!!
The legendary gadabout...has arrived at last!!

198032.「ミヤビっちが言ってた……\n ピエロとバニーの ふたり組……！:
It's just like Miyabi said...
A pair dressed as a clown and a bunny...!

198033.「うふっ アツアツのおフロ よかったでしょ～<heart>\n やっぱりぃ～ 遊:
Hmm hmm...that hot bath was just amaaazing,
wasn't it? <heart> I kneeew it! A gadabout's fun's
no good if it's not excitin'! <heart>

198034.「そや そや！ 言うたれ！\n 近頃のヤングの 遊びときたらなァ！\n ごっつ:
Dat's right, dat's right! You tell 'em! The
way these youngsters goof off nowadays...
It's pretty dang lame if you ask me!

198035.「そないな ツマラン遊びで 喜びよってからに\n 遊び人のカザカミにも 置けへん:
All of youse are a disgrace to gadabouts everywhere with that lame goofin' off! If you're gonna keep being so lame, you
should just up and quit!

198036.「あ～？ なんだと てめーら？\n ルッチーさんの考える 遊びはな～\n やっべ:
Huuh? The heck are you talkin' about?!
Lucchie's idea of fun...it's a real blast!!

198037.「アヒャヒャ～！ そないな自信あるんやったら\n ワイらが出す 遊び人の試練を受:
A-hya-hya! Well now, if you're so confident, go ahead and try this gadabout test we're gonna give you! Pass, and we might just
recognize ya as true gadabouts!

198038.「だ～が 逃げたり 失敗するようなら……\n ワレ 遊び人を名乗るのを やめろや:
Buuuut...if ya run away, or fail...you can't
call yourself gadabouts anymore!!
Then, obedient labor for all of youse!

198039.「遊び人を……やめさせようってのか……？:
You're trying to...stop us from bein'
gadabouts...?

198040.「やっぱり アンタたちが 労魔デスワーク……:
Just as I thought... So YOU guys are
Deathwork...

198041.「……オイ ワレ！\n 今日のところは 時間切れや！: 'ey, you buncha rascals! Time's up for today!

198043.「ジブンら！ 遊び人を続けたいなら\n ワイらの試練を おとなしく受けることやな:
Y'all listen up! If you wanna keep bein'
gadabouts, then just shut up and take our
test! We're outta here!

198046.「……果たし状だ。\n 試練の内容が 書いてあるみてーだな。:
It's a challenge letter... Looks like it's got
the details of that test.

198047.「ええ～？ ルッチーさん\n ガチで アイツらが言ってた試練\n 受けるつもりっ:
What!? Are you really gonna take that test
they were just talkin' about...?

198048.「……まあな。\n アイツら 労魔デスワークにちがいねえ。\n バケの皮を はい:
...yeah, I guess so. There's no doubt that
they're Deathwork. They gotta be tough as
nails.

198049.「いや～ とんだ ジャマ者が入っちまって\n ごめんな～ <pc>っち。\n と:
Anyways, <pc>... Sorry 'bout all the
unexpected trouble. Let's just head back
to the Gadabode for now!

199414.「さっそく ハニーパーティーと\n シャレこみますか！: Let's get this Honey Party started, shall we?!
